import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import CartItems from '../components/CartItems' import Navbar from '../components/Navbar' import './CSS/cart.css' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' const Cart = () => { const products = useSelector(state => state.cart.products) const quantity =useSelector(state => state.cart.quantity) const totaPrice = useSelector(state => state.cart.totaPrice) console.log(products,totaPrice) useEffect(()=>{ if(quantity>0){ document.querySelector('.cart-content-wrapper').style.display = 'flex' } }) return (
{products.map((item) => ( ))}
PRICE DETAILS({quantity} Item)
Total Price ₹{totaPrice}
Delivery Fee
₹99
Total Amount
₹{totaPrice+99}
) } export default Cart
